content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There are certain offices, access to which requires special permissions.Â  Study article \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/_XkZFw\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Access to EPAM offices\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to learn about such offices and how access to such areas is granted.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ask your mentor to practice requests about granting access to Closed Perimeters in EPAM offices.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
